entry.title: WIND WARNING , Stephenville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:24 PM NST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, 5.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Stephenville Airport 11:30 PM NST Monday 16 January 2023
Condition: Partly Cloudy
Temperature: 5.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.5 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 88 %
Dewpoint: 3.4°C
Wind: E 39 km/h gust 49 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Showers. Temperature rising to 8 by morning.
entry.summary: Showers ending overnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind east 50 km/h gusting to 70 except gusting to 100 along parts of the coast this evening. Wind becoming southeast 30 gusting to 60 near midnight. Temperature rising to 8 by morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 along parts of the coast in the afternoon. High 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Showers. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight with showers. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming southwest 20 overnight. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 16 January 2023
